body.p:
Williamstown June 9th 1863
To His Excellency
J F Robinson
Dear Sir

enclosed I send you herewith the petition of Sundry Citizens of Grant County asking the remission of a fine imposed upon Benjamin McGlasson at the May term of the Grant Circuit Court. Mr McGlasson is a poor man has a large family -- and if required to pay the whole amount of the fine it will very nearly if not entirely break him up -- he has heretofore been a peaceable quiet man -- and I think his case such an one as to Justify the interpositions of your excellencys clemency

Very Respetfully yours &c
E. H. Smith

To his Excellency J F Robinson
Govenor of Ky
